Introduction
This topic contains special instructions for for handling cases that involve the duplicate payment of benefits, including
action to take upon discovering duplicate payments
consideration of administrative errors
types of duplicate payments that may not be treated as an administrative error
example 1 of a duplicate payment that may not be treated as an administrative error
example 2 of a duplicate payment that may not be treated as an administrative error
example 3 of a duplicate payment that may not be treated as an administrative error
example 4 of a duplicate payment that may not be treated as an administrative error
, and
example of a duplicate payment that should be treated as an administrative error
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Correcting the Erroneous Payment of Benefits to a Beneficiary
